title: Bugsplat
body: Out of nowhere, I keep getting a bugsplat window right away when I try to launch the (new) client, and it just keeps popping up, even after I restarted my laptop. Help?

replies.body: If this is the client loading and not a match, then something may have gone wrong with the installation.  If you installed the updated test client then you may need to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I don't think there was anything wrong with any installation, I had installed the new client back when it was released and had no problems. I really didn't do anything noticeable. I just uninstalled and reinstalled the game and now works fine. Thanks for the response.
